name: Subcube (itch)
description:
Subcube is a mind game, where you roll cube segments in order to reconstruct cubes. It looks simple but simplicity is an illusion. The idea behind the game is the difficulty of human brain to imagine successive rotations, and we believe the game will push your spatial intelligence to it's limits .

the game includes:

  • 123 puzzles
  • infinite skyfall mode
  • Ranking system

Controls:

You can play Subcube, with mouse or keyboard or joypad. The Keyboard bindings are:

ENTER/TAB:  select segment

arrow keys/WASD: roll in a direction

Z.X: rotate view

ESC: call menu

R: reset level

credits:

code, gfx, sound: Spyros Pettas

level design: Aggelos Dimitrakopoulos
